title: Master P Interview and more
itunes:title: Master P Interview and more
description:
Thursday 8/17- Today on the show we had Master P in the building where he spoke about Kodak Black, his documentary and more. Also, Charlamagne also gave Christopher Cantwell the biggest hee-haw after his racist unapologetic  racist comments for “Donkey of the Day” and Angela Yee gave some listeners advice for “Ask Yee”.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
